item.title: 網宇實體系統研究室
item.description:
News

We have moved to https://web.ntnu.edu.tw/~cw/

  • We are recruiting. Prospective students please take a look at this page.
  • IEEE RTCSA 2022, August 23–25, 2022.
  • 2021 Embedded Systems Week (ESWEEK'21), October 8-15, 2021, virtual conference

The Networked Cyber-Physical Systems Laboratory (NCL) was founded in 2019 at National Taiwan Normal University.

“He is like a tree
planted by streams of water
that yields its fruit in its season,
and its leaf does not wither.”
– Psalm 1:3a
